casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Patrick O. POWELL, a/k/a Patrick Edwards, Daniel Mitchell, and Edwards P. Mitchell, Defendant-Petitioner. C-905 September Term 2018
082144 Supreme Court of New Jersey. May 14, 2019

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-005582-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is granted, limited to the sentencing issues, and the matter is summarily remanded to the trial court to provide a statement of reasons regarding the sentence imposed, including findings with respect to aggravating and mitigating factors. Jurisdiction is not retained.
